scripts.dev: export MDC_LIGHT_FOLDER=mdclight && export PORT=8083 && export NODE_ENV=development && export LOG_LEVEL=debug && export MDC_LIGHT_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(git describe --tags) && export SYS_PREFIX=mdclight && npm run setup:local:dev && export MOCK_USER_BUTTON=true && ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only --max-old-space-size=1024 src/index.ts
scripts.dev:debugger: export MDC_LIGHT_FOLDER=mdclight && export NODE_ENV=development && export PORT=8083 && export LOG_LEVEL=debug && export MDC_LIGHT_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(git describe --tags) && export SYS_PREFIX=mdclight && npm run setup:local:dev && export MOCK_USER_BUTTON=true && ts-node-dev --respawn --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 --transpile-only --max-old-space-size=1024 src/index.ts
